name: Merek Crowhand
title: The Grave Warden

features.title: War Priest
features.desc: As a bonus action, you can make one weapon attack. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Wisdom modifier per long rest.

features.title: Channel Divinity: Guided Strike
features.desc: When you make an attack roll, you can use your Channel Divinity to gain a +10 bonus to the roll.

features.title: Shelter of the Faithful
features.desc: You can perform religious ceremonies and command the respect of those who share your faith. You and your party can expect to receive free healing and care at a temple of your faith.

equipment: Chain mail, a shield, a warhammer, a holy symbol (raven skull), an explorer's pack, and a pouch with 15 gp.

personality.traits: I am tolerant of other faiths and respect the worship of other gods. I see omens in every event and actionâ€”the gods try to speak to us, we just need to listen.
personality.ideal: Aspiration. I seek to prove myself worthy of my god's favor by matching my actions against their teachings.
personality.bond: I will do anything to protect the temple where I served.
personality.flaw: Once I pick a goal, I become obsessed with it to the detriment of everything else in my life.

spells.name: Guidance
spells.desc: Touch one creature. Once before the spell ends, the target can roll a d4 and add it to one ability check of its choice.

spells.name: Sacred Flame
spells.desc: Flame-like radiance descends on a creature. It must succeed on a DEX save or take 1d8 radiant damage.

spells.name: Bless
spells.desc: Up to three creatures gain a +d4 bonus to attack rolls and saving throws.

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.desc: A creature you touch regains 1d8 + WIS modifier hit points.

spells.name: Guiding Bolt
spells.desc: Ranged spell attack deals 4d6 radiant damage, and the next attack roll against the target has advantage.

spells.name: Spiritual Weapon
spells.desc: Create a floating, spectral weapon that attacks as a bonus action.
